sentences.sentence: There followed an assortment of praise for the coffee along the lines of "Hey, this coffee is fantastic!"
sentences.translation: 接着是各种各样大概就像“嘿，这咖啡真棒”一样的对咖啡的称赞。

sentences.sentence: He was dressed in an odd assortment of clothes.
The adult observers were able to reliably discern an assortment of emotions on the babies' faces.
sentences.translation: 成年观察者能够有依据地辨别出婴儿脸上的各种情绪。
